risks.title: Single Point of Failure - Operator
risks.impact: Complete system unavailability if sole operator is unavailable
risks.notes: Accepted risk for lab environment. Mitigation focuses on knowledge transfer and automation.

risks.title: No Disaster Recovery
risks.impact: Data loss and extended downtime in case of infrastructure failure
risks.mitigation: Implementing backup strategy, DR documentation in progress
risks.notes: Priority mitigation. Backup strategy being developed.

risks.title: Incomplete Security Hardening
risks.impact: Potential unauthorized access or data exposure
risks.mitigation: Security audit planned, WAF rules in development
risks.notes: Lab-only status limits exposure. Production requires completion.

risks.title: Missing Compliance Framework
risks.impact: Cannot serve regulated customers or process sensitive data
risks.notes: Lab-only status means no compliance required currently.

risks.title: Undocumented Dependencies
risks.notes: Package-lock and requirements files exist but SBOM not generated.

risks.title: AI Agent Hallucination
risks.mitigation: Human oversight, guardrails in board protocol
risks.notes: Lab environment allows for testing and validation before production.

risks.title: Vault Single Point of Failure
risks.impact: Secret management unavailable if Vault fails
risks.notes: Single instance acceptable for lab. HA required for production.

risks.title: Discord API Rate Limits
risks.impact: Temporary service degradation if rate limited
risks.notes: Rate limits configured in discovery.yml. Low traffic in lab.
